job_tasks.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the process of using human expertise to identify shortcomings in AI systems and then actively working to improve those systems, which aligns with the definition of model improvement and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly maps to the definition of providing feedback and participating in fine-tuning sessions for AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies falls under the broader umbrella of software development and integration, even if the tools are AI-related.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system to enhance customer service, which aligns with software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: we will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products within a short timeframe.

soft_skills.phrase: if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, aligning with the definition of being adept at unblocking oneself.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on applying human expertise to improve AI systems and integrating AI capabilities into customer support. While there's an element of AI model fine-tuning (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on using and improving existing AI systems within a support context, rather than core AI model development or deep generative AI specialization. The role involves integrating AI into a broader system (customer support) and improving that system, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile which is predominantly Macro-Category A with AI integration.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI system improvement and integration within a customer support context. While it mentions 'fine-tuning sessions', the overall scope leans more towards applying and enhancing AI within an existing operational framework rather than deep AI research or development. The profile assignment is reasonably confident based on this emphasis.
